title: Gaggle, Herd, and Pod
description: Readers may have heard about a pack of wolves or a litter of puppies, but do they know which animals make up a gaggle or a pod? In Gaggle, Herd, and Pod, readers learn the meaning of these terms and more. Engaging photographs support the text.
